ISSUE.TITLE: Rename DSE7 to HCD
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: DSE7 is rebranded to HCD. We should update the DSE7 artifacts to be labeled HCD.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Rename DSE7 to HCD (#485) * Rename DSE7 to HCD

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Release v0.1.77 * [BUGFIX] [#480](https://github.com/k8ssandra/management-api-for-apache-cassandra/issues/480) python 2 missing on ubi cass-management-api images 3.11 * [CHANGE] [#484](https://github.com/k8ssandra/management-api-for-apache-cassandra/issues/484) Rename DSE7 to HCD
